column1: NGR is from 1950s record. Altitudes reasonable match. The gauge appears to have moved sevaral times over the period. The later records are by the steelworks, which is 1km to the West. The other records mention proximity to chemical works; there are two the other side of the River Dee one is 1km South and the other is 2 km W but be one as part of the steelworks. Therefore NGR could be 1 km W or SW or even further; the altitudes in the area are all consistent at 20ft +/- 5 ft.
